events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but decided I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and the color looks different than online.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request to return the purchased item.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle this refund case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help with your return.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is still new, tags are attached, and it’s in the original packaging.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we’ll email you shortly, and once received, we’ll process your refund.
Great, thanks for the quick response! I’ll wait for the return label and send the jacket back as soon as I get it.
The prepaid return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive your return, your refund will be processed promptly.
We wanted to check in and confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I dropped the package off at the post office yesterday. Thank you for following up!
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Please let us know how we did in assisting with your refund.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey, indicating positive experience with the refund process.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
